description: During [Operation Spalax](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0005), the threat actors sent phishing emails that included a PDF document that in some cases led to the download and execution of malware.(Citation: ESET Operation Spalax Jan 2021)

external_references.description: M. Porolli. (2021, January 21). Operation Spalax: Targeted malware attacks in Colombia. Retrieved September 16, 2022.
